WildFly Full 19 Model Reference

  1. home
  2. core-service=management
  3. security-realm
  4. authorization=ldap
  5. group-search=principal-to-group
  6. cache=by-search-time
Deprecated Since 1.7.0
The security-realm configuration is deprecated and may be removed or moved in future versions.

A cache to hold the results of previous LDAP interactions.

Attributes (4)

  • cache-failures Should failures be cached?
    • Attribute Value
    Default Value false
    Type BOOLEAN
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed true
    Storage configuration
    Access Type read-write
    Restart Required resource-services
  • cache-size The current size of the cache.
    • Attribute Value
    Type INT
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Unit SECONDS
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • eviction-time The time in seconds until an entry should be evicted from the cache.
    • Attribute Value
    Default Value 900
    Type INT
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed true
    Unit SECONDS
    Storage configuration
    Access Type read-write
    Restart Required resource-services
  • max-cache-size The maximum size of the cache before the oldest items are removed to make room for new entries.
    • Attribute Value
    Default Value 0
    Type INT
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed true
    Storage configuration
    Access Type read-write
    Restart Required resource-services

Operations (4)

  • add Add a new cache definition.
    Request Parameter Type Required Expressions Allowed Default value Description
    cache-failures BOOLEAN false true false Should failures be cached?
    eviction-time INT false true 900 The time in seconds until an entry should be evicted from the cache.
    max-cache-size INT false true 0 The maximum size of the cache before the oldest items are removed to make room for new entries.
  • contains Operation to check if the cache contains a specific entry.
    Request Parameter Type Required Expressions Allowed Default value Description
    name STRING false false The simple name to search the cache for.
    distinguished-name STRING false false The distinguished name to search the cache for.
  • flush-cache Operation to either flush the entire cache or to flush a single entry out of the cache.
    Request Parameter Type Required Expressions Allowed Default value Description
    name STRING false false The simple name to flush from the cache.
    distinguished-name STRING false false The distinguished name to flush from the cache.
  • remove Remove the cache definition.
